homePage.heroTitle: Enter the Ecosystem Define Your On-Chain Edge
homePage.heroSubtitle: One platform to discover, track, and claim the best airdrops in Web3. Spend less time searching, more time earning.
homePage.howItWorksSubtitle: Your journey to maximizing Web3 rewards begins now. It's fast, powerful, and built for you.
homePage.step1Description: Mint your AFA Identity to unlock the entire ecosystem. This is your all-access pass.
homePage.step2Description: Browse our curated list of airdrops and events. We only list projects with real potential.
homePage.step3Description: Use our dashboard to manage tasks, monitor your progress, and claim rewards easily.
homePage.featuresSubtitle: We built AFA to give you an unfair advantage. Here's how we do it.
homePage.feature1Description: No more noise. Get access to pre-vetted airdrops from projects that matter.
homePage.feature2Description: Never lose track of a task again. Your entire airdrop portfolio, simplified.
homePage.feature3Description: Join the discussion, share strategies, and get insider info before anyone else.
homePage.feature4Description: Access token giveaways and special events that you won't find anywhere else.
homePage.sponsorAttractionSubtitle: Showcase your project to a hyper-engaged audience of thousands of active airdrop hunters, DeFi users, and Web3 natives. Let's build the future together.
homePage.benefit1: Direct access to a targeted, high-intent audience
homePage.benefit2: Increased brand visibility and trust within the ecosystem
homePage.benefit3: Custom co-marketing campaigns and community events
homePage.testimonialsTitle: Don't Just Take Our Word For It
homePage.testimonialsSubtitle: See what our community of hardcore airdrop hunters are saying about us.
homePage.testimonial1Quote: AFA is a game-changer. I've saved countless hours and found gems I would've missed otherwise. 10/10.
homePage.testimonial2Quote: The task tracker is sick! Finally, I can manage everything in one place without a messy spreadsheet. Lifesaver!
homePage.testimonial3Quote: The community is the real alpha. The exclusive events paid for my subscription 10x over. Get in here!
homePage.communitySubtitle: Get real-time alpha, support, and connect with thousands of other airdrop hunters. This is where the action happens.
homePage.joinCtaSubtitle: Connect with the community, leverage our tools, and be at the forefront of the next Web3 wave. Your journey begins with a single click.

footer.description: The best platform to find and track airdrops.

eventsPage.subtitle: Join exclusive events for AFA community members and win exciting prizes!

afaIdentityPage.title: Claim Your AFA Identity
afaIdentityPage.subtitle: Mint a unique NFT that represents your identity in the AFA Web3Tool ecosystem.
afaIdentityPage.description: By holding the AFA Identity NFT, you gain access to exclusive features, special community roles, and potential future rewards. This is your passport to the Web3 world with AFA.
